name: Ghost Hitch (Yucchi)
description:
James Cook University Game Jam 2018. Theme : Travel

This game is a simple Point and Click puzzle game. The game summary is that you play as a Ghost, your mission is to possess people while trying to get back your memories.

Due to time constraints, we were only able to finish one level. Everything you see including models, animation & music is done within the 24 hour jam.

Controls - Holding Space bar & left clicking.

Purple circle represents the range of possessing / suggestion. Humans will follow the suggestion, only after the suggestion is completed and he has returned to what he was doing previously, then you will be able to issue another suggestion. 

Humans who are highlighted in color means they can be possessed.
